actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to provide for a phasing out of the earnings limitation.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance
subjects_top_term: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends Title II (Old-Age, Survivors, and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act to decrease, by phasing out over a seven-year period, the percentage of a social security recipient's outside earnings which will be deducted from benefits.

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to provide for a phasing out of the earnings limitation.
